amendment.description: An amendment to strike out all after the enacting clause and insert a new text entitled "Broadband Deployment Accuracy and Technological Availability Act" or the "Broadband DATA Act".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike out all after the enacting clause and insert a new text entitled "Broadband Deployment Accuracy and Technological Availability Act" or the "Broadband DATA Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Pallone.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Pallone.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
